channel.title: reproducibility on Sina Rüeger
channel.description: Recent content in reproducibility on Sina Rüeger

item.title: FINEMAP howto
item.description: Aim The aim is, to better understand FINEMAP and reproduce Figure 7 in Benner et al. 2016 that is about fine-mapping of 15q21/LIPC region associated with high-density lipo- protein cholesterol. Fine-mapping of 15q21/ LIPC region associated with high-density lipoprotein cholesterol. Independent association signals in conditional analysis are highlighted by yellow dot. Dashed lines correspond respectively to a single-SNP Bayes factor of 100 and P -value of 5×10−8 .
